name: Infura
introduce:
Infura is a blockchain infrastructure development platform of high availability APIs and developer tools provide quick, reliable access to the Ethereum and IPFS networks for developers.
Infura makes blockchain development a simple, cohesive experience with all tools of developers in one place: Ethereum Nodes, Eth2 Nodes, Transaction Relaying, Layer 2 Networks, IPFS, Filecoin, and more, Which make developers can focus on building and scaling next generation software.
